resetStatsBtnHandler() - Method in class controller.FlappyBirdMenuController
 
respawnTubes(boolean, boolean, boolean) - Method in class controller.FlappyBirdGameController
The respawnTubes method takes in a boolean value to represent which pair of tubes should be respawned, and respawns them at the beginning of their cycle in a random position (i.e., gap is near top, near bottom, or in middle)
returnToMainMenuHandler() - Method in class controller.FlappyBirdPostGameMenuController
The returnToMainMenuHandler method listens for a SPACE input to navigate back to the main menu
rise(double) - Method in class model.Bird
The move method moves the bird upwards (like a flapping movement)
